title: How many values of a (0 < a < 360) does pentagon A' B' C' D' E' coincide with pentagon ABCDE? What is significant about this number? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pentagon A’B’C’D’E’ is a size transformation of pentagon ABCDE. One is magnified or reduced size of the other. The corresponding angles are equal. If the pentagon is regular, then each angle is 108°. Sum of interior angles of a pentagon is 540°. Even if the pentagon is irregular, the corresponding angles will be equal.
